000.text: Ah, greetings, young magician! I have a couple of tasks to cope with... Would you like to help me? Of course, I will give you an interesting bonus =)

1000.text: It's nice to hear that you're ready to help me out. Are you ready for the first task?

2000.text: Don`t worry, my friend. I will wait for you here!

001.text: My first task for you is to explore the world! I think, you could buy one more thread to extend your equipment and earn 10 coins. It will be perfect start! You can an find information about your quest opening QuestBar on the left side of screen.

002.text: Great job! I have the second task for you.

003.text: Your task is to defeat one of the enemies. However, try your luck first, maybe it will bring you something interesting! You can an find information about your quest opening QuestBar on the left side of screen.
